description.value:
Trigger You're hit with an unarmed Strike or a Strike with a non-reach melee weapon.

Frequency once per day

Several of your thorns break off and hook into your attacker's body. You deal @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2)d8)[piercing]] damage to the triggering creature. It attempts a @Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic] save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. On a critical failure, the creature also takes @Damage[(1d4+ceil(@actor.level/2)-1)[bleed]] damage as your thorns embed in its flesh.

At 3rd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, this damage increases by 1d8, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.
